item.description:
In honor of Chris Columbus who sailed the sea not sure what he would find, I'd like to explore some uncharted territory riding east to west along the border between Massachusetts, Rhode Island and Connecticut.

The Ride will begin at the Museum of Bad Art in Dedham Square and head west on Farm Street that becomes Farm Rd to Rt 16 - we will follow Rt 16 South and West to Webster, MA. From there we will carve our way west finding new roads till we get to Sturbridge then slab it back home.

Anyone wanting to ride to Dedham from Newton - please meet at the Hess in Newton at 9:30 AM Sharp! Come earlier if you want to chat over coffee, I will be there at 9:15 and departing no later than 9:40, unless you call me 617-584-4797, if you are on a smaller scoot I suggest mapping your way to Dedham on back roads as we will be taking 95 down from the Hess.

Link to the Museum of Bad Art LINK

Travel time from Newton to Dedham via 95 - 15 min, from cambridge, 30 min - use the above map to plot your journey.

Dress warm, Monday is going to be sunny, a little windy and 55-60.

Paul
item.name: Explorers Ride
